mapper.insert: insert into toy ( toy_no , toy_for_coin, toy_img, toy_desc, toy_now_coin, toy_origin_coin, toy_cost, current_state ) values ( #{toyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toyForCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toyImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toyNowCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toyOriginCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toyCost, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currentState, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select id, toy_no, toy_for_coin, toy_img, toy_desc, toy_now_coin, toy_origin_coin, toy_cost, current_state from toy where current_state = 1 limit #{startPage}, #{pageSize}
select id, toy_no, toy_for_coin, toy_img, toy_desc, toy_now_coin, toy_origin_coin, toy_cost, current_state from toy where current_state = 1 and id = #{id} and toy_no = #{toyNo}
mapper.update: update toy set toy_for_coin = #{toyForCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, toy_img = #{toyImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toy_desc = #{toyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toy_now_coin = #{toyNowCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, toy_origin_coin = #{toyOriginCoin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, toy_cost = #{toyCost, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_state = #{currentState, jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id} and toy_no = #{toyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
